stories.title: Manage Route
stories.text:
# Feature 1: Manage Route

# As a user
# So that I can create, edit and delete routes
# I want to manage a route

Feature: Manage route
	Background:
		Given that I am the user
		And I am logged in
		And I am on the home page

    Scenario: Successfully creating a route
    	When I click “My Routes”
    	Then I should see a list of my routes
    	When I click “Create route”
    	Then I should be asked to enter the route’s information
    	When I enter the route’s information
    	And I make sure to fill all mandatory information
    	And I click “Create”
    	Then the new route should be added to my list of routes
    	And I should see a message saying “Route Created”
    	And I should be returned to the “My Routes” window
    	
    Scenario: Unsuccessfully creating a route
    	When I click “My Routes”
    	Then I should see a list of my routes
    	When I click “Create route”
    	Then I should be asked to enter the route’s information
    	When I enter the route’s information
    	But I do not make sure to fill all mandatory information
    	And I click “Create”
        Then I should see a message saying “Please fill all mandatory information”
        And I should again be asked to enter the route’s information
    
    Scenario: Successfully canceling the editing of a route
    	When I click “My Routes”
    	Then I should see a list of my routes
    	When I select a route
    	Then I should see a display of the selected route’s information
    	When I click “Edit”
        Then I should be prompted to make changes to the information already filled
        When I make changes to the information
        And I click “Cancel”
        Then I should be returned to the display of the selected route’s information
    
    Scenario: Successfully canceling the creation of a route
    	When I click “My Routes”
    	Then I should see a list of my routes
    	When I click “Create route”
    	Then I should be asked to enter the route’s information
    	When I enter the route’s information
    	And I click “Cancel”
    	Then I should be returned to the “My Routes” window
    
    Scenario: Successfully editing a route
    	When I click “My Routes”
    	Then I should see a list of my routes
    	When I select a route
    	Then I should see a display of the selected route’s information
    	When I click “Edit”
    	Then I should be prompted to make changes to the information already filled
    	When I change the information
    	And I make sure to keep all the mandatory information filled
    	And I click “Update”
    	Then the route’s information should update according to my changes
    	And I should see a message saying “Route Updated”
    	And I should be returned to the display of the selected route’s information
    	
    Scenario: Unsuccessfully editing a route
    	When I click “My Routes”
    	Then I should see a list of my routes
    	When I select a route
    	Then I should see a display of the selected route’s information
    	When I click “Edit”
    	Then I should be prompted to make changes to the information already filled
    	When I change the information
    	But I do not make sure to keep all the mandatory information filled
    	And I click “Update”
        Then I should see a message saying “Please fill all mandatory information”
        And I should again be prompted to make changes to the information already filled
    
    Scenario: Successfully deleting a route
    	When I click “My Routes”
    	Then I should see a list of my routes
    	When I select a route
    	Then I should see a display of the selected route’s information
    	When I click the Delete icon
    	Then I should see a message saying “Are you sure you want to delete this route?”
    	When I select “Yes”
    	Then the selected route should be deleted
    	And I should be returned to the “My Routes” window
    
    Scenario: Successfully canceling the deletion of a route
    	When I click “My Routes”
    	Then I should see a list of my routes
    	When I select a route
    	Then I should see a display of the selected route’s information
    	When I click the Delete icon
    	Then I should see a message saying “Are you sure you want to delete this route?”
    	When I select “No”
    	Then I should be returned to the display of the selected route’s information

linkedRequirements.text: The user must be able to create routes.
The user must be able to edit his routes.
The user must be able to delete his routes.

stories.title: Report User
stories.text:
# Feature 4: Report User

# As a user
# So that I can report other user’s behavior
# I want to manage a report

Feature: Manage report
	Background:
		Given that I am the user
		And I am logged in
		And I am viewing another user’s profile

    Scenario: Successfully filing a report
    	When I click “Report”
    	Then I should be prompted to enter a report description
    	When I enter the description
    	And I make sure the description is not empty
    	And I click “File”
    	Then my report should be sent to the administration team
    	And I should see a message saying “Report filed”
    	And I should be returned to the user profile I was viewing
    
    Scenario: Unsuccessfully filing a report
    	When I click “Report”
    	Then I should be prompted to enter a report description
    	When I enter the description
    	But I do not make sure the description is not empty
    	And I click “File”
    	Then I should see a message saying “Please provide a description”
        And I should again be asked to enter a report description
    
    Scenario: Successfully canceling the filing of a report
    	When I click “Report”
    	Then I should be prompted to enter a report description
    	When I enter the description
    	And I click “Cancel”
    	Then I should be returned to the user profile I was viewing

linkedRequirements.text: The user must be able to report other users.
The user must be able to view user profiles.

stories.title: Manage User Review
stories.text:
# Feature 5: Manage User Review

# As a user
# So that I can post, edit and delete a review on a specific user
# I want to manage a user review

Feature: Manage user review
	Background:
		Given that I am the user
		And I am logged in
		And I am viewing another user’s profile

    Scenario: Successfully writing a review
    	When I click “Reviews”
    	Then I should see a list of reviews about this user
    	When I click “Write Review”
    	Then I should be asked to enter the review’s information
    	When I enter the review’s information
    	And I make sure to fill all mandatory information
    	And I click “Post”
    	Then the new review should be added to the list of the user's reviews
    	And I should see a message saying “Review Posted”
    	And I should be returned to the list of the user's reviews
    	
    Scenario: Unsuccessfully writing a review
    	When I click “Reviews”
    	Then I should see a list of reviews about this user
    	When I click “Write Review”
    	Then I should be asked to enter the review’s information

    	But I do not make sure to fill all mandatory information

        Then I should see a message saying “Please fill all mandatory information”
        And I should again be asked to enter the review’s information
    
    Scenario: Successfully canceling the writing of a review

    	Then I should see a list of reviews about this user

    	When I enter the review’s information

    Scenario: Successfully editing my review
    	When I click “Reviews”

    	When I select my review
    	Then I should see a display of my review’s information
    	When I click “Edit”
    	Then I should be prompted to make changes to the information already filled
    	When I change the information
    	And I make sure to keep all the mandatory information filled
    	And I click “Update”
    	Then my review’s information should update according to my changes
    	And I should see a message saying “Review Updated”
    	And I should be returned to the display of my review’s information
    	
    Scenario: Unsuccessfully editing my review
    	When I click “Reviews”

    	When I change the information
    	But I do not make sure to keep all the mandatory information filled
    	And I click “Update”
        Then I should see a message saying “Please fill all mandatory information”
        And I should again be prompted to make changes to the information already filled
    
    Scenario: Successfully canceling the editing of my review
    	When I click “Reviews”
    	Then I should see a list of reviews about this user
    	When I select my review
    	Then I should see a display of my review’s information
    	When I click “Edit”
        Then I should be prompted to make changes to the information already filled
        When I make changes to the information
        And I click “Cancel”
        Then I should be returned to the display of my review’s information
    
    Scenario: Successfully deleting my review

    	When I select my review
    	Then I should see a display of my review’s information
    	When I click the Delete icon
    	Then I should see a message saying “Are you sure you want to delete your review?”
    	When I select “Yes”
    	Then my review should be deleted
    	And I should be returned to the list of the user's reviews
    
    Scenario: Successfully canceling the deletion of my review
    	When I click “Reviews”
    	Then I should see a list of reviews about this user
    	When I select my review
    	Then I should see a display of my review’s information
    	When I click the Delete icon
    	Then I should see a message saying “Are you sure you want to delete your review?”
    	When I select “No”
    	Then I should be returned to the display of my review’s information
